p: Red betel leaves extract treatments could reduce TNF-Î± level, reduce cell's apoptosis and increase live cells percentage, reduce intracellular ROS, reduce CYP2E1 and increase GPX level in HepG2 cells. This marked the hepatoprotective potential of RBLE through antioxidant, anti-necrotic, and anti-inflammatory activities. Further research on in vivo model is needed to confirm current result.
